attributes.action: Make the use of Digital Health Passports illegal
attributes.additional_details: The use of any form of digital medical or health certification is a gross invasion of privacy and the first step towards a “papers please” checkpoint society. It is also in direct conflict with core British values of openness and inclusion. Such certification is highly coercive in nature as it raises the prospect of citizens having no choice but to undergo medical procedures and/or constant testing in order to avoid being excluded from society.
attributes.background: Prohibit the use of ‘NHS Covid Pass’ or medical certification in any UK setting. Health passports and digital ID are a major infringement on privacy, data protection and personal liberties.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596004
